queries.query: huge dragon with exceptional speed and agility that dwells in the air
queries.variant: huge dragon that has amazing speed and agility and lives in the sky

queries.query: dragon immune to poison that can deafen its enemies with a roar
queries.variant: dragon that can't be harmed by poison and can deafen foes with its roar

queries.query: stealthy dragon with keen senses that hunts from the skies
queries.variant: sneaky dragon with sharp senses that preys from above

queries.query: felid dragon with magical resistance and pounce ability
queries.variant: dragon with magic resistance and the ability to pounce on enemies

queries.query: agile dragon that strikes with claws and bites while flying
queries.variant: swift dragon that attacks with its claws and bite while in the air
